entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Western Head
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:58 AM AST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 5.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Western Head 11:00 AM AST Monday 16 January 2023
Temperature: 5.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: 4.8°C
Wind: NNE 16 km/h gust 35 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Rain. High 9.
entry.summary: Rain with risk of thundershowers. Fog patches. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast early this afternoon. Wind becoming light this afternoon. High 9. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers this evening and after midnight. Showers beginning after midnight. Fog patches. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Low 6. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Showers. Temperature steady near 6.
entry.summary: Showers. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Temperature steady near 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy. High plus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Monday 16 January 2023
